projects.name: SNEAK PEAK!!!!
projects.description: Working on a fullstack project for the Stockholm based company KLANG-RUM. Take a look at the code for now and stay tuned for the release!

projects.name: Fullstack project: WEBIFY
projects.description: In this, very meta, fullstack project we made an e-commerce that sells web-templates. Using AI we created pictures of our products and we implenented everything we learnt from the Bootcamp. Please ENJOY!

projects.name: The first fullstack project: HappyThoughts
projects.description: Positive vibes only! With this api-powered app you can post, read and like happy thoughts from everywhere! Please see the backend on Github!

projects.name: SECRET SAVER
projects.description: Shhh! We won't tell anyone! Your secret is safe with our authentication project! We made a secure backend and wonderful Wen made a quick frontend for it! Check out the backend in Github!

projects.name: Empowering Vinyasa Yoga
projects.description: Welcome to the world of relaxation, yoga and soulfullness. In this project we made a UX-designers project come to life on the W W W.

projects.name: The game for people who like nice images of forests
projects.description: Imagain an old school Indiana Jones-themed video game where we used Technigos API for a labyrinth. Or don't imagain! Try it out yourself!

projects.name: Keep track of your daily todo's
projects.description: This egg themed todo-list helps you keep track of all the things you need to do! Start cracking!
